AIInsightValue.name: AIInsightValue
AIInsightValue.description: Represents an Einstein prediction insight value.

AiInsightActionId.description: The unique ID of the associated AIInsightAction.

AiRecordInsightId.description: The unique ID of the associated AIRecordInsight.

Confidence.description: Relative confidence strength of the generated prediction insight. Higher values (near 1.0) indicate stronger confidence.

Field.description: The name of the target field Einstein is making predictions for, such as “AnnualRevenue”.

SobjectLookupValueId.description: The unique ID of the value object, if this insight value references an object.

SobjectType.description: The type of the value object, such as Account or Case, if this insight value references an object.

ValueType.description: The data type of the prediction result insight value. Possible values are: Boolean—Boolean Currency—Currency DateTime—DateTime Enum—Enum Lookup—Lookup Number—Number String—String
